name: Marvel: Avengers Alliance
description:
Marvel: Avengers Alliance is a strategy game developed by Playdom. It came out on 13-06-2013. It was published by Marvel Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Marvel: Avengers Alliance is available on iOS and Android.
Julia Fredrickson, Justin Woods and Tony Sherrill produced the game. Bill Rosemann, Chia Chin Lee, Michael Rubinelli and Robert Reichner directed the game.
